## gk issue list

Show list of issues

### Synopsis


  This command allows you to view all the open issues that are currently assigned to you. Available providers: github, gitlab, jira, azure


```
gk issue list [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  issue list <provider>
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for list
```
